entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
AREAS OF DENSE FOG THIS MORNING, THEN PATCHY FOG THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

entry.em: NEW YEARS DAY AND THURSDAY NIGHT
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS AROUND 20

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
